header.title: MSSTI RSS Feed 2.0 with ACP
header.description: Changes for Subsilver2 based off style
header.author-notes:
You will have to make this change to ALL themes you have installed, based off Subsilver2. I use "Subsilver2" as an example. ------------------------------------------------------------------- IMPORTANT !
Before made any changes, makes sure your template is stored into "filesystem" ACP -> STYLES -> STYLE COMPONENTS -> Templates : subsilver2 -> Details
If you do not want to change from "Database" to "Filesystem", you must do next changes within your ACP : ACP -> STYLES -> STYLE COMPONENTS -> Templates : subsilver2 -> Edit
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Need extra support ? -------------------- You can contact me at http://www.mssti.com/phpbb3/

action-group.diy-instructions:
IMPORTANT !
##################################################################### Log on to Administration Control Panel
##################################################################### A) Purge the templates :
A.1) Navigate to "STYLES" Tab. A.2) Under "Style components " click on "Templates". A.3) Under "Actions" click on "Refresh". A.4) in the next screen, click on "Yes" ( Repeat last 2 steps to each instaled style, based off Subsilver2 ).
